Name: SUPER RECOILFIGHT
About the game: SUPER RECOILFIGHT is a one-button projectile brawler-shooter optimized for 4 player gameplay on a single keyboard. You move and aim using the recoil of your shots, so time them right to win against your friends, AI or both. Features: Up to 4 players on a single keyboard Easy to learn, hard to master VS AI gameplay Interesting modifiers to shake your game up 19 Challenging, interactive and fun maps NOTICE: You can only have two human players when you do not own the supporter pack, namely P1 and P2. To allow P3 and P4 to be PC, you need the supporter pack. This is done to offset the development costs of the game. It is still playable with up to 2 PC and 2 AI players without the DLC. Feel free to visit our discord for information, help and feedback purposes.
